title-group.article-title: Financial Planning in a Decentralized Firm under Conditions of Competitive Capital Markets

abstract.p: This paper examines a planning process which separates the liquidity planning function from the fixed capital allocation problem in a decentralized company. The effects of competitive capital markets on firm allocation procedures are included in the analysis.
